```{r cars}
library(plyr)
library(knitr)
library(mclust)
library(ggplot2)
library(klaR)

# Read in csv file
chronicDiseaseIndicator = read.csv(file='C:/Users/vivek pawar/Desktop/AppliedDataScience/Group Project/ChronicDisease_Clustering/chronicDiseaseIndicator_Stratification.csv', header=T)

clust = Mclust(chronicDiseaseIndicator[, 1:4])
chronicDiseaseIndicator$cluster = clust$classification
ggplot(data = chronicDiseaseIndicator, aes(x = LocationDesc , y =DataValue, color = as.factor(cluster)))+ geom_point() + theme(text = element_text(size = 10), axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 80, vjust = 1, hjust = 1))

ggplot(data = chronicDiseaseIndicator, aes(x = Topic , y =DataValue, color = as.factor(cluster)))+ geom_point() + theme(text = element_text(size = 10), axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 80, vjust = 1, hjust = 1))

ggplot(data = chronicDiseaseIndicator, aes(x = Topic , y =Stratification1, color = as.factor(cluster)))+ geom_point() + theme(text = element_text(size = 10), axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 80, vjust = 1, hjust = 1))


# Read in csv file
chronicDiseaseIndicatoR_GENDER = read.csv(file='C:/Users/vivek pawar/Desktop/AppliedDataScience/Group Project/ChronicDisease_Clustering/chronicDiseaseIndicator_gender.csv', header=T)

clust = Mclust(chronicDiseaseIndicatoR_GENDER[, 1:3])
chronicDiseaseIndicatoR_GENDER$cluster = clust$classification

ggplot(data = chronicDiseaseIndicatoR_GENDER, aes(x = Topic , y =Stratification1, color = as.factor(cluster)))+ geom_point() + theme(text = element_text(size = 10), axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 80, vjust = 1, hjust = 1))

ggplot(data = chronicDiseaseIndicatoR_GENDER, aes(x = LocationDesc , y =Topic, color = as.factor(cluster)))+ geom_point() + theme(text = element_text(size = 10), axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 80, vjust = 1, hjust = 1))


pairs(chronicDiseaseIndicator[, 1:3], col = chronicDiseaseIndicator$cluster)

```
